bibl.title: Jan SANDERS, Richard SULLIVAN and Cathleen VILLAS, Ancient Naukratis. Volume II: The Survey at Naukratis and Environs. Part I: The Survey at Naukratis. (Oxbow Monograph 60.)

COULSON William D.E., with the assistance of Iphigeneia LEVENTI and with contributions by James REHARD, Jan SANDERS, Richard SULLIVAN and Cathleen VILLAS, Ancient Naukratis. Volume II: The Survey at Naukratis and Environs. Part I: The Survey at Naukratis. (Oxbow Monograph 60.)
